page.title: 03OUR "BLOCK"
page.content: The "Block" shows some parts of Yorkshire where we live. From Scissett School to Wheatley Hill it is about 3 miles. To get to Cawthorne Park it is about 11 miles from Scissett School. Scissett Middle School was built in about 1947, it covers 12 square kilometres. Before, it was called Skelmanthorpe Secondary School. At Scissett Middle School there are about 519 pupils. If you were driving from Scissett to Clayton West it would take about 2 minutes, but if you drive from Scissett to Cannon Hall it would take about 10 minutes. There is a First School and a Middle School in Scissett.
